titleInfo.title: Webb Pierce and Tommy Cash Singles

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. mods.abstract: One color offset printing plate (red on silver) advertising Webb Pierce's song, "Fool, Fool, Fool," written by Max Powell and Wayne P. Walker, and Tommy Cash's song, "Tobacco Road," written by John D. Loudermilk. The plate features photographs of Webb Pierce and Tommy Cash.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
